item.description: There will be wine tasting. Bring appetizers to share but no beverages. We can either sit by a double sided fireplace or on their lovely patio with a spectacular view. No charge. To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 1339 Whirlwind Hill Road: I-91S to Exit 14, ramp end turn left onto East Center Street, turn right onto Whirlwind Hill Road. Iâ€™ll wait at the building entrance until 2:15 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the building entrance until 2:15 pm.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
